# zitadel_organization_metadatas (Data Source)

Datasource representing metadata entries of an organization in ZITADEL.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `organization_id` (String) ID of the organization

### Optional

- `key` (String) Filter metadata by key

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `metadata` (List of Object) List of organization metadata entries (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--metadata))

<a id="nestedatt--metadata"></a>
### Nested Schema for `metadata`

Read-Only:

- `key` (String)
- `value` (String)
